TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Group extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture

summary.span: 代表單一擷取群組的結果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single capturing group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取的群組可以擷取零、 一或多個在單一比對字串，因為數量詞。A capturing group can capture zero, one, or more strings in a single match because of quantifiers. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱[數量詞](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md)。)單一擷取群組相符的子字串都是從屬性。(For more information, see [Quantifiers](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md).) All the substrings matched by a single capturing group are available from the property. 擷取的最後一個子字串的相關資訊可直接從`Value`和`Index`屬性。Information about the last substring captured can be accessed directly from the `Value` and `Index` properties. (也就是說，執行個體所傳回的集合的最後一個項目相當會反映擷取群組所做的最後一個擷取的屬性。)(That is, the instance is equivalent to the last item of the collection returned by the property, which reflects the last capture made by the capturing group.) 範例有助於釐清之間的關聯性物件和所傳回屬性。An example helps to clarify this relationship between a object and the that is returned by the property. 規則運算式模式`(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+[?.!]`符合整個句子。The regular expression pattern `(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+[?.!]` matches entire sentences. 規則運算式的定義如下表所示。The regular expression is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|開始字緣比對。Begin the match at a word boundary.| |`(\w+?)`|比對一或多個字元，但字元數愈少愈好。Match one or more word characters, but as few characters as possible. 這是第二個 （內部） 擷取群組。This is the second (inner) capturing group. (這是第一個擷取群組包含`\b`語言項目。)(The first capturing group includes the `\b` language element.)| |`[,:;]?`|比對零個或一個逗號、 冒號或分號。Match zero or one occurrence of a comma, colon, or semicolon.| |`\s?`|比對零個或一個空格字元。Match zero or one occurrence of a white-space character.| |`(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+`|比對字邊界、 一個或多個文字字元、 標點符號，以及組成空格字元一或多次的模式。Match the pattern consisting of a word boundary, one or more word characters, a punctuation symbol, and a white-space character one or more times. 這是第一個擷取群組。This is the first capturing group.| |`[?.!]`|任何比對句號、 問號或驚嘆號。Match any occurrence of a period, question mark, or exclamation point.| 在規則運算式模式中，子模式`(\w+?)`設計為比對句子內的多個字。In this regular expression pattern, the subpattern `(\w+?)` is designed to match multiple words within a sentence. 不過，值只有最後一個相符的物件都代表`(\w+?)`會擷取，而屬性會傳回，代表所有擷取的文字。However, the value of the object represents only the last match that `(\w+?)` captures, whereas the property returns a that represents all captured text. 如輸出所示，第二個擷取群組包含四個物件。As the output shows, the for the second capturing group contains four objects. 最後一種對應至物件。The last of these corresponds to the object. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.class/cs/groupandcaptures1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.class/vb/groupandcaptures1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Captures As CaptureCollection

summary.span: 依照最內層最左邊為優先的順序，取得符合擷取群組的所有擷取的集合 (如果規則運算式使用 選項修改，則依照最內層最右邊為優先的順序)，

span.span: Gets a collection of all the captures matched by the capturing group, in innermost-leftmost-first order (or innermost-rightmost-first order if the regular expression is modified with the option).

summary.span: 集合可能有零個或更多項目。

span.span: The collection may have zero or more items.

value.span: 符合群組的子字串集合。

span.span: The collection of substrings matched by the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果將數量詞不會套用至擷取群組，所傳回的集合屬性包含單一提供為相同的子字串的相關資訊的物件物件。If a quantifier is not applied to a capturing group, the collection returned by the property contains a single object that provides information about the same substring as the object. 下列範例可說明此點。This is illustrated in the following example. 它會定義規則運算式， `\b(\w+)\b`，擷取單一 word 從句子。It defines a regular expression, `\b(\w+)\b`, that extracts a single word from a sentence. 物件中擷取文字"This"和中的單一物件包含相同的擷取的相關資訊。The object captures the word "This", and the single object in the contains information about the same capture. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/cs/captures1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/vb/captures1.vb#1)] 實際的公用程式的數量詞套用至擷取群組，讓群組擷取單一規則運算式中的多個子字串時，就會發生屬性。The real utility of the property occurs when a quantifier is applied to a capturing group so that the group captures multiple substrings in a single regular expression. 在此情況下，物件包含的最後一個擷取子字串的相關資訊，而屬性包含群組所擷取的子字串相關資訊。In this case, the object contains information about the last captured substring, whereas the property contains information about all the substrings captured by the group. 在下列範例中，規則運算式`\b(\w+\s*)+\.`符合以句點結尾了整個句子。In the following example, the regular expression `\b(\w+\s*)+\.` matches an entire sentence that ends in a period. 群組`(\w+\s*)+`擷取集合中個別的文字。The group `(\w+\s*)+` captures the individual words in the collection. 因為集合包含最後擷取的子字串的相關資訊，它會擷取在句子，"句子 」 的最後一個字。Because the collection contains information only about the last captured substring, it captures the last word in the sentence, "sentence". 不過，群組所擷取的每個字，可以從所傳回的集合屬性。However, each word captured by the group is available from the collection returned by the property. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/cs/captures2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/vb/captures2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回目前執行個體所代表的擷取群組名稱。

span.span: Returns the name of the capturing group representing by the current instance.

value.span: 目前執行個體所代表的擷取群組名稱。

span.span: The name of the capturing group represented by the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Success As Boolean
public: property bool Success { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出比對是否成功。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the match is successful.

value.span: 如果比對成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the match is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Success`屬性為 true，如果至少一個子字串此群組所擷取。The `Success` property is true if at least one substring was captured by this group. 它相當於布林運算式 (Group.Captures.Count > 0)。It is equivalent to the Boolean expression (Group.Captures.Count > 0).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group Synchronized(class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group inner) cil managed
Public Shared Function Synchronized (inner As Group) As Group

summary.span: 傳回 物件，相等於可安全地在多個執行緒之間共用而提供的物件。

span.span: Returns a object equivalent to the one supplied that is safe to share between multiple threads.
